response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth. I trust that you will appreciate its significance and make an informed decision. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
